name: 孫殷同
objective:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.
schedule:
採中英雙語教學
Week
     Topic(s)
1    Introduction
2    Basic--Word Choice, Modal Verbs, Relative Clauses
3    Conditionals, Pronouns & Determiners
4    Verb Forms & Tenses and Passives
5,6 Reading Comprehension
7,8 Reading Exercises & Mid-term Review
9    Mid-term
10  Word Forms/Word Choice and Dependent Prepositions
11  Look-Alike Words and Transitional Words & Phrases
12  Transitional words & phrases/Review of Incomplete Sentences
13  Review of Text Completion
14  Reading with Double or Triple Passages
15  Reading Exercises
16  Final
scorePolicy:
Midterm 35%
Final 35%
Quizzes 20%
Participation and homework assignments 10%
